title: "Globe, Amazon partner to reduce downtime"
excerpt: "GLOBE Telecom Inc. has partnered with a unit of US-based Amazon to deploy G-Climate, a digital service used to reduce the downtime of cell sites and ensure business continuity during times of natural calamities. The cloud native service uses predictive analytics to identify potential outages, specifically during the typhoon season."
